title: Understanding Coordinate Format
text: The ordered pairs are given in coordinate format with (x,y). The $$x$$ value will be plugged into the $$x$$ variable of the given equation and the same for the $$y$$ value in the $$y$$ variable.

title: Rearranging Equation
text: What will the equation look like when rearranged so that all variables are on one side?

title: Plugging in Ordered Pairs
text: In order to check which ordered pairs are solutions, plug in each option into the rearranged equation to check if it outputs the right answer.

title: Plugging in $$(4,3)$$
text: What does the ordered pair $$(4,3)$$ output when plugged into the equation?

title: Plugging in $$(-1,-1)$$
text: What does the ordered pair $$(-1,-1)$$ output when plugged into the equation?

title: Plugging in $$(\frac{1}{2},5)$$
text: What does the ordered pair $$(\frac{1}{2},5)$$ output when plugged into the equation?

title: Identifying Correct Ordered Pairs
text: Which ordered pairs satisfy the solution to the given equation?
